CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical and electrochemical properties of the synthesized copolymers showed were slight modification upon perylene addition.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| copolymers |
| perylene |

Note: I've assumed that "copolymers" and "perylene" are materials in this context. If "copolymers" refers to a process or method, then there would be no material names in this paragraph.

Paragraph: The optical and electrochemical properties of the synthesized copolymers showed were slight modification upon perylene addition.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| optical properties |
| electrochemical properties |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| optical properties |
| electrochemical properties |

The paragraph only contains two clear material properties: "optical properties" and "electrochemical properties". The phrase "slight modification" is not a material property, but rather a description of the change in the properties upon perylene addition.

The entities "optical properties", "electrochemical properties", and "slight modification" are all mentioned in the paragraph as properties of the synthesized copolymers. I have presented them as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| --- |
| slight modification |

Upon reviewing the paragraph again, I realized that the entities "optical properties" and "electrochemical properties" do not refer to a specific value of a material property, but rather to a category of properties. Therefore, I have removed them from the list. The only remaining entity that clearly refers to a value of a material property is "slight modification". I have presented it as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".
